name: start.me header remove
description: Removes header, footer, and add widget buttons.
additional_info: Does not remove the optional pages bar and allows the user to customize the color of the pages bar. This style is designed to maximize the viewing area of existing pages. To create or extensively edit a page, it is best to disable this style and re-enable it when it is in a stable state.

discussions.name: Start.me Header Remove Not Working with Waterfox 56.2.12
